cl:Definition.cl:UIListView:
<% for (var i = 0, l = docArray.length; i
<cl:UIListItem label='<%=docArray[i].name%>' data='<%=docArray[i].name%>'>
<% for (var j = 0, k = docArray[i].value.length;j <% var classObj = docArray[i].value[j]; %> <cl:UIListItem label='<%=classObj.name%>' data='<%=classObj.value.nm.replace(/\./g, "_")%>' /> <% } %>
<% } %>
